title: .vscode出现fail_to_download_vs_code_server解决办法（转载）
content:
查看失败日志，锁定commit id
到外网环境下载：curl -sSL “https://update.code.visualstudio.com/commit:${commit_id}/server-linux-x64/stable” -o vscode-server-linux-x64.tar.gz
mkdir -p ~/.vscode-server/bin/${commit_id}
tar zxvf /tmp/vscode-server-linux-x64.tar.gz -C ~/.vscode-server/bin/${commit_id} –strip 1
touch ~/.vscode-server/bin/${commit_id}/0
text: 查看失败日志，锁定commit id到外网环境下载：curl -sSL “https://update.code.visualstudio.com/commit...
